flavorText: "What is drowned is not forgotten. I will fulfill my oath. Come back to me, my brethren, as I have come back for you."

foreignData.flavorText: „Was untergegangen ist, ist nicht vergessen. Ich werde meinen Eid erfüllen. Kommt zurück zu mir, meine Brüder, sowie auch ich zurück zu euch gekommen bin."
foreignData.name: Niederfenn-Beschwörer
foreignData.text: {T}: Bis zu zwei Sümpfe deiner Wahl werden zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen bis zum Ende des Zuges zu 3/5 (Baumhirte, Krieger)-Kreaturen.

foreignData.flavorText: "Lo que se hunde no se olvida. Cumpliré mi promesa. Vuelvan a mí, hermanos, así como yo volví a ustedes."
foreignData.name: Invocador de marjal profundo
foreignData.text: {T}: Hasta dos pantanos objetivo se convierten cada uno en una criatura Guerrero Pueblo-arbóreo 3/5 además de sus otros tipos hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ce qui est noyé n'est pas oublié. Je serai fidèle à mon serment. Revenez, mes frères. Je suis venu vous chercher. »
foreignData.name: Invocateur des bas-fonds
foreignData.text: {T} : Jusqu'à deux marais ciblés deviennent chacun des créatures 3/5 Sylvin et Guerrier en plus de leurs autres types jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ciò che è affogato non sarà dimenticato. Adempierò al mio dovere. Tornate a me, fratelli miei, poiché sono giunto qui per voi."
foreignData.name: Evocatore della Palude Profonda
foreignData.text: {T}: Fino a due Paludi bersaglio diventano creature Guerriero Silvantropo 3/5 in aggiunta ai propri altri tipi fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「溺れ死し者は忘れざる。 我は誓いを果たす者。 同胞よ、我は戻れりたり、我の元へ戻れ。」
foreignData.name: 沼深みの召喚士
foreignData.text: {T}：沼を最大２つまで対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それらは他のタイプに加えて３/５のツリーフォーク･戦士・クリーチャーになる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ツリーフォーク・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: "O que foi afogado não foi esquecido. Eu cumprirei meu juramento. Voltem para mim, meus irmãos, assim como eu voltei para vocês."
foreignData.name: Invocador do Pântano Fundo
foreignData.text: {T}: Até dois Pântanos alvo se tornam criaturas 3/5 do tipo Ent Guerreiro cada um, além de seus outros tipos, até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Утонувшие не забыты. Я сдержу свое слово. Вернитесь ко мне, братья мои, как я вернулся за вами»
foreignData.name: Вызыватель Болотных Топей
foreignData.text: {T}: До двух целевых Болот становятся существами 3/5 Лесовик Воин в дополнение к своим другим типам до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「没顶者并未遭遗忘。 我将达成誓言。 回到我身边吧，伙伴；如同已回到你身边的我。」
foreignData.name: 深沼召唤师
foreignData.text: {T}：直到回合结束，至多两个目标沼泽成为3/5树妖／战士生物，且仍具有原本类别。

name: Fendeep Summoner
originalText: {T}: Up to two target Swamps each become 3/5 Treefolk Warrior creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.

rulings.text: You may target zero, one, or two Swamps with this ability.

A Swamp affected by this ability is still a land, still a Swamp, and may still be tapped for black mana. If it had any other card types or subtypes, it retains those as well. This ability doesn’t affect the permanent’s colors, if any.

A Swamp affected by this ability is subject to the “summoning sickness” rule: If its controller hasn’t continuously controlled it since the beginning of their most recent turn, it can’t attack or be tapped for mana (or use any other {T} abilities).

text: {T}: Up to two target Swamps each become 3/5 Treefolk Warrior creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.
